system.descriptor: Those capable of bending the warp into unholy powers, they are both exceptionally dangers if lacking the strength of will to control their powers, and incredibly powerful when properly trained to wield their powers.
system.uses:
If the character does not have the Adeptus Astra Telepathica Background and are not Sanctioned, the character counts as a Highly Illegal Rogue Psyker and immediately gain 1d10+3 Corruption.
Regardless, character immediately gains the Psyker Trait, Psyker Aptitude, and Psy Rating of 1. THey can no longer gain the Untouchable Elite Advance for any reason.

description.value: Those capable of bending the warp into unholy powers, they are both exceptionally dangers if lacking the strength of will to control their powers, and incredibly powerful when properly trained to wield their powers.
